text: xallxhˌ thrng plid chiwit nı yam tay khxng man læa man(chiwit)ca yang mi tay nı yam nxn hlab khxng man phraxngkh ca thrng plid chiwit thi phraxngkh thrng kahnd khwam tay hı kæ man læa phraxngkh thrng yud chiwit xun pi cnthung wela thi thuk kahnd wi thæcring nı kar nan nænxn yxm pen sayya sahrab hmu chn phu khırkhrwy
